meanings.definition: Extremely loud or piercing in sound.
meanings.sent1: The earsplitting noise of the fire alarm made everyone cover their ears.
meanings.sent2: The rock concert was so earsplitting that I could feel the vibrations in my chest.
meanings.sent3: The earsplitting sound of the baby's laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The earsplitting silence in the library was broken by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent5: The earsplitting thunder shook the windows and rattled the dishes in the cupboard.
